name: Slap it 3D
description:
Prove to everyone that you’ve got the sharpest reflexes by challenging them to a classic fast reaction game – Hand Slap!
Easy and fun to play, this game tests your reflexes and reaction speed so if you don’t pay attention, you might just lose to your opponent!
• Multiplayer Mode- Match up with strangers from across the world and show no mercy in order to move up the Leader board Rankings!
• Two highly entertaining game play modes to choose from!
• Tap on the screen at the right moment to attack. Brace yourself and defend your character! Use mighty Power Ups to gain the upper hand! There’s never a dull moment in this game.
• Choose who you want to be from a variety of characters available!
• Get ready for a swashbuckling pirate adventure or choose to have some fun in the sand with our island environment.
Get ready to relive your childhood memories without really feeling the pain! Download now for FREE and enjoy!
